name: TAP TAP Square: Arcade Edition
description:
TAP TAP Square Arcade Edition is a brand new tapping game with a multitude of levels, all being unique and ranging in difficulty. You control a small blue square and your aim is to avoid the red, this will give you an extra point! Simple as that! Wait?.. Your job is to collect the gold coins that will grant you 1 credit, which will be used as "lives" in the game. When the credit count hits zero its game over!

Try to collect the special coins (rainbow). Collecting these will enable the "Fury Dash!", with this you can gain a maximum of two points when you avoid the red, however, this will allow you for a few seconds to tap your way through without a resulting loss of game.
